required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Research Evaluating a PDE5 Inhibitor for Erectile Dysfunction
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Evaluation of Avanafil for On-Demand Treatment of Men With Erectile Dysfunction

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: The objectives of this study are to examine the therapeutic effects of two doses of avanafil after dosing in men with erectile dysfunction

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Change in percentage of sexual attempts in which subjects are able to maintain an erection of sufficient duration to have successful intercourse

intervention.description: One dose 15 minutes before attempting intercourse
One dose 15 minutes before attempting intercourse
One dose 15 minutes before attempting intercourse
